```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#install.packages("SmartEDA")
library(SmartEDA)
data <- read.csv("2024-srcsc-superlife-inforce-dataset.csv")
economy <- read.csv("economy_cleaned.csv")
intervention <- read.csv("intervention_cleaned.csv")
```

```{r}
ExpData(data)
ExpData(economy)
ExpData(intervention)
```


```{r}
ExpData(data, type = 2)
ExpData(economy, type = 2)
ExpData(intervention, type = 2)
```

```{r}
ExpNumViz(data)
ExpNumViz(economy)
ExpNumViz(intervention)
```

```{r}
ExpCatViz(data)
# no categorical var in economy
ExpCatViz(intervention)
```
